website_summaries.verdict: Made with no binders or fillers, this multivitamin is a great vegetarian option that includes probiotics.
pros: Stands out for including raw whole foods, live probiotics and enzymes, and no GMO ingredients
Including co-factors - micronutrients that attach to nutrient molecules - means it offers nutrition close to actual foods
cons: It is on the higher end of the price spectrum for a multivitamin, but if quality of ingredients are important, it might be worth it

customer_reviews.title: Improved my energy!
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are great! They are large and have a slight veggie taste when swallowing, but they are so worth taking! I have really bad fatigue and I noticed a big improvement in my energy when I started taking these. I only take 2 a day. The few times that I've stopped taking them I feel tired and anxious all over again. Really pleased with this product - worth every penny! If you found my review helpful, please click Yes below! :)
customer_reviews.author: madeline audreyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Sold out to NESTLE
customer_reviews.text: I will no longer be buying this vitamin because of that. I've noticed that the vitamins start to smell and seem to degrade/change color quicker. Now I have to look for another alternative.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product give me a lot of gas. I ordered it based on the makeup of the vitamin, but every time I take two pills...I have gas for hours. Waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Knocks regular vitamins and probiotics/ digestive enzymes out of the water
customer_reviews.text: After two months of watching daily electrolytes on Keto diet, upgraded my Whole Foods vitamin to this Vitamin Code. After a month, I noticeably don't need to supplement with sodium, magnesium, potassium, bone broth etc as often. Completely worth the $$ as this also has a probiotic included ($20-30 separately at Whole Foods). Personally, I love taking two times a day as it seems to aid digestion (no longer buy separate digestive enzymes either). I'm recommending this to all my friends and family and just re-ordered for myself. Will continue for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: GingerWine09

customer_reviews.title: Yikes- Black/cracked pill
customer_reviews.text: This makes me nervous- either the pill is burnt or has mold growing in it
customer_reviews.author: B H

customer_reviews.title: These vitamins gave me the worst upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins gave me the worst upset stomach. I’ve been bloated with gas. They make you constantly go to the bathroom. Horrible on your stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Sure it’s Expensive but your health matters
customer_reviews.text: I always thought vitamins were a scam. I figured that eating well would lead to health. Nope! It’s impossible to get all of the nutrients we need because of the way our food is processed. I’ve never felt better due to these vitamins! They certainly help with chronic fatigue without harmful additives. Also the raw food supplement goes straight to your body due to its preparation.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie A.

customer_reviews.title: Broken damaged opened
customer_reviews.text: Came broken and damaged and opened. When i tried to open the safety seal it came off easily and i can see the leftover marks of adhesions on the rim, menaig it was opened, then glued back or something. Dont like my vitamins being tampered with, knowing someone might have opened them its scary
customer_reviews.author: N.K

customer_reviews.title: Allergic to this
customer_reviews.text: I’m one of those people that doesn’t think this vitamin is so great. I only took two capsules per day for a few days and had some horrible reactions. My face broke out in acne (I’m 48...not acne prone anymore), all over my body my skin was itchy, sensitive, and felt chapped. My calves cramped up, and I’ve had insomnia! Overall, I’ve felt pretty terrible. I couldn’t figure out what the heck was going on, until I linked it back to these vitamins. Stopped taking them, and everything went away.
customer_reviews.author: MistyBlue

customer_reviews.title: "Oh crap, I haven't been taking my vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I work at a college with a lot of students from all over the country and world. I can tell when the students come back each year or from breaks, everyone gets sick. I've consistently been able to tell that when I do not take these vitamins when they come back, I get sick. I've said twice, "Oh crap, I haven't been taking my vitamins!" They definitely help your immune system. I don't even get flu shots anymore.
customer_reviews.author: ReneeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins with clean ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a women's multi-vitamin that had ingredients that I could understand. This vitamin clearly states the whole foods that the ingredients are from and there are no binders or fillers. They're small (added a picture next to a penny for reference) and easy to swallow. There is a slightly sweet aftertaste which makes taking two pills at a time much easier. Also, I take it with breakfast and dinner and it doesn't upset my stomach. I'm very sensitive to vitamin ingredients and other vitamins made me nauseous. Not this one!
customer_reviews.author: B_Apple

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These gave me indigestion and nausea, had the return them.
customer_reviews.author: N. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Nausea, headaches and GI issues
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this multivitamin since my nutritionist recommended it and the fact that it’s hard to find capsule vitamins. Unfortunately after only taking 4 pills an day for only 5 days, it has caused me some GI issues. I would take these after a meal and after 30 minutes the headaches and nausea would kick in. Don’t waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Great ingredients, but I missed the part where it instructs the user to take FOUR capsules a day. I originally thought this bottle will lasts months, but no, at four a day it will last a month IF I can remember to take them. My wife and are retired so I won’t be able to afford these next month. These vitamins do have absolutely the best ingredients in them though...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wallace

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Could not sleep for days after taking vitamins. You cannot return them.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product services
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this vitamin here before. When i received the box the shipping box was fine but the box inside was damaged and open. It also has an old sticker for some baby gate product on it. When i pulled the bottle out the cap was on but misthreaded and uneven. I opened the lid to check the seal and it is burned and charred. What the heck. This is simply not ok. Tried to contact the company and the link doesn’t work. Going to return they amazon. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Erin R Houser

customer_reviews.title: gives energy, improves blood circulation, makes my face look healthier
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. The only downside is needing to take 4 capsules per day, preferably spaced out because there is no timed release. At first I got some mild jitters, but it's leveled out now. They never give me a migraine like the GNC Mega vitamins started doing (I think due to the ingredient changes). I like that they don't have Stevia or artificial sweeteners or colors added. And they give me energy, and improve my blood flow. My face looks better, has more color. I've been taking 2 at breakfast and 2 at lunch, which seems to be working well for me. I hope they don't add any garbage ingredients in the future!
customer_reviews.author: mcdsweettea

customer_reviews.title: Shattered Glass throughout Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with three other things in the box, no packing of any kind in the box. I opened the Vitamin Box and pulled the bottle out only to have vitamins scatter across my floor. I hurriedly got the dog out of the room and noticed the bottom of the vitamin bottle was utterly shattered. As I picked up the vitamins, I saw shards of glass throughout the bottle and on the floor. Not happy at all and a bit scared to take these for fear of glass fragments.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Clean vitamins - clean gut!
customer_reviews.text: I’m normally not one to leave reviews. But this product significantly helped me. I was looking for a clean multi vitamin to help heal my gut from the inside out. I could see a visible difference in how clear my skin was within one week, and also felt more energized and not as reliant on caffeine. The bottle says to take 4 capsules a day, but I’ve been taking 2 and can still see and feel a major difference. If you are looking for a multi vitamin with clean ingredients, can’t go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Gold

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL LOWER ABDOMINAL PAIN
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE AWFUL!! These give me horrible lower abdominal pains! I even just started with taking just one and since day one I had awful lower abdominal pain, took a week off (no pain) then gave it a try again and once again awful pain! NO THANK YOU! HIGHLY DO NOT RECOMMEND and wish I could return and get my money back but since I’ve used several I know I can’t. BUYER BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Jenichka Kalash

customer_reviews.title: You will feel more energized!
customer_reviews.text: I like taking this product as I feel it give me more energy and does somewhat aid my digestion. It also helps with immunity and keeps me from getting sick. The capsules are somewhat large but I can easily swallow them with a few sips of water. I highly recommend trying these vitamins if you like natural ingredients and want to feel good about what you put into your body. Drinking water with these helps if you are prone to stomach upset as I am on certain days.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D'Amore

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamins, with iron!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor wanted me to take a multivitamin with iron, and this has the best balance of iron and other vitamins that I could find. I was already on probiotics, so that was a bonus for those to be included. It's a lot of pill taking (twice a day, I got over it) but I feel so much better. I planned to try to switch back after my iron balanced out, but I really like these. I'm gonna stick with these vitamins for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Impchucker

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vitamin! I used to use ALIVE, and thought I'd switch to these as I like the ingredients list much better. These vitamins are great! They give me so much energy! I literally can't take one after 4 pm or I have a hard time going to sleep. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: K.T.

customer_reviews.title: The Only Brand I Can Stomach
customer_reviews.text: I've probably spent more money of vitamins and pills than clothing for the year. I've tried so many brands and even started buying individual pills to create my own "multivitamin" - but who has time for swallowing 15 pills? The Garden of Life Women's Raw Whole Food Vitamin is the ONLY brand I've been able to take that doesn't hurt my stomach or make me feel slightly queasy or make my stomach irritable. Maybe it's the "raw food" part, maybe it's the quality. I don't know. I just know that it's the only brand of multivitamin I'm buying from now on and I'm very happy to have found something that finally works.
customer_reviews.author: Naa

customer_reviews.title: Caused stomach problems
customer_reviews.text: Caused gas and diarrhea. Have it a chance for an entire month- all problems go away as soon I stop taking the pills
customer_reviews.author: EDITA AROLD

customer_reviews.title: Find another brand.
customer_reviews.text: If I do keep them down, I have a muddy grass taste all day coming up. I have never been so nauseous from a vitamin in my life! Just say NO!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Relieved a ton of aches, pains, and overall fatigue!
customer_reviews.text: No more fatigue, leg cramps, and just plain ickiness. I have been feeling quite ill and fatigued for several months and I started a new job and felt significantly worse afterwards because everything hurt. I began taking these vitamins 2 at a time for one week and then moving up to 4 pills for thereafter, so my system would get used to them, and I have noticed that my joints feel better and I don't feel as fatigued after a long work day. I also feel better since I am no longer feeling fibrocystic breast pain regularly and my energy level overall has increased. I think these products are very high quality and I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: FelineFriendly

customer_reviews.title: Top quality vitamins & good price
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best vitamins I’ve ever had. I seriously felt better physically and mentally more alert within days after starting to take them. I usually forget to take the 2nd dose, but I feel fabulous so I guess it will only extend my supply a bit. The product was delivered packaged nicer than any vitamin product I have ever seen-Glass Jars?!! I’ve not encountered any ill effects from these either, which is rare as most supplements will upset my stomach or will cause issue and not digest properly & this had no bad experience at all. I will purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best multi!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried SO MANY different brands for my multi vitamin, this is the only one that covers EVERYTHING women need. Not to mention the ingredients are all organic and raw. Worth every penny, self care is important and garden of life gets it done right.

customer_reviews.title: I love these vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I love these vitamins. The only negative in my mind is that you have to take 4 a day. But otherwise they are great. The fact that they have 1000 iu of Vitamin d is very nice as most multivitamins have much less. They also include probiotics. They do not upset my stomach at all, even if I take all 4 at once. I usually just take 2 with 2 different meals to make sure they absorb. I have nothing negative to say about these. They are great and I will continue to purchase these over cheaper alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G.

customer_reviews.title: They do help me to stay active and feel better and I actually checked with my doctor before buying ...
customer_reviews.text: It's the second time I take this vitamins. I left a 6 months period in between taking them to see if I noticed any changes. They do help me to stay active and feel better and I actually checked with my doctor before buying them again and he said they should be good but of no use unless you have a good diet. After all, it still just a suplement but I must say is a good one. I did notice my energy level to improve during the day and even a better sleep during nights.

customer_reviews.title: Product is ok
customer_reviews.text: Pills are large but easy to swallow. No bad after taste. I haven’t seen a dip in my milk supply which is major. The product was shipped in an amazon bag without any bubble wrap so my bottle came with a broken cap; seal was intact so I wasn’t too annoyed. No difference in energy level but I have a 4 yr old and a 2 month old so I wasnt expecting a dramatic change.

Also vit D, all B, I wish I looked into this before purchasing. I had a terrible reaction after just 1 dose, broke out all over my face and had to use cortisone. Save your $ and avoid toxicity

customer_reviews.title: These have been a life saver for me. Since ...

The price is a little steep but I think it is worth it! I have seen a significant change in mood, sleep, energy, I haven't gotten very ill this year either and my hair has grown a lot! I am impressed and glad to have given this brand a shot! Will continue to use them!

customer_reviews.title: Be careful....
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how legit these are sold on amazon, but they are definitely not good if they cause issues similar to IBS symptoms without any previous history of this. I was pretty disappointed when there were so many great reviews for this product and it was highly recommended by a friend. These vitamins were the only thing I changed to my diet/routine. Definitely do not plan on continuing to take these and run the risk of causing permanent damage to my body. Buy with caution.

customer_reviews.text: My first order of these was delivered almost exactly a month ago, and the price is now nearly double what I paid for it. That order seemed reasonable for the quality of what you received, but no longer. These are no longer worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Not for acne prone people
customer_reviews.text: Long story short: They made my face break out. I have taken straight biotin before in the past, a hair health mix that gave 300% of daily value which made me break out badly, so I though taking these twice a day while being mixed with so many other vitamins would help my body not freak out abut the biotin but I am on day 3 and recognize a definite biotin breakout already, which actually first appeared over night. I look like a damn teenager so sadly I will have to find someone to give these away to and try to find a women's multi V that does NT contain Biotin :(

customer_reviews.title: Best vitamin/digestive aide

It has helped me ward off the nasty winter sicknesses and aids in digestive problems. I have lactose intolerance and can take this with a meal to prevent an upset stomach. I am so pleased with this vitamin/digestive aide and notice a difference when I eat it with a meal and when I do not. I highly recommend for anyone with digestion issues! I take 2 pills with 2 meals each day.

customer_reviews.title: GOL Womens multi vit. have made warts on my hand disappear when even doctors removing them did not work!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, I don't feel any different when I take these but I know they help my body somehow. I hate 2 little warts on my pointer finger, that would keep growing back after removal for years. These Garden of Life Vitamin Code Women's Multi 120 count made the warts disappear after a month and they have not come back after a whole year of taking these. The price on Amazon can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: fairiebutterflymomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Awesome so far!
customer_reviews.text: I've never been one to take vitamins but decided to start due to several minor health issues that all pointed to needing to focus on my micronutrients. After research, I ultimately decided on these because the reviews cited seeing a notable difference in health (versus reviews on other highly reviewed vitamins typically cited "tasting good" as the primary benefit). Boy were those reviews right! I've been taking them for 2.5 weeks now and my skin has cleared up considerably and has a healthy glow (even my boyfriend noticed). I also have noticed that I have much more energy when I take them. Can't wait to see what other health improvements come with taking these long term!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie R.

I soon realized that the bloating started soon after I started taking these a few weeks ago. Very unfortunate because these were expensive and now I have to toss the rest of the vitamins out. I've been reading other reviews and this seems to be a common complaint.

customer_reviews.title: May have helped with migraines
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product for just about 2 months now. If you have trouble swallowing pills these may be difficult to swallow. I typically have severe migraines during my period. I just finished my 2nd period while taking these vitamins and I had zero headache or migraine. I do not know if these are reason but I have not changed anything else other than starting these vitamins. They do turn your urine bright yellow, just an fyi.

Just makes it a bit easier. I just finished my third jar. These are very good vitamins. Most importantly, I noticed a drastic change in my hair growth. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.author: Venus Jordan

customer_reviews.title: It's synthetic now!
customer_reviews.text: It used to be a great vitamin BUT don't be fooled. It was bought by another company and they stripped it of everything natural! Missing some important logos. 7/19/20
customer_reviews.author: Delora C

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this after reading the reviews. However, after taking this, I feel extremely bloated and uncomfortable. I'm so bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that I had to take 4 vitamins a day. I didn't feel any differently while on them then a different brand vitamin that I took before. It's hard to give a review on a vitamin because everyone's body is different and it's a pill but I wouldn't spend the money on these again.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyGirl

customer_reviews.title: no neon pee
customer_reviews.text: My pee isn't radioactive and I don't have a super boast when I took this. A very natural does of energy.
customer_reviews.author: Pency Gaw

customer_reviews.title: Big and distasteful but effective
customer_reviews.text: These are huge pills and you are suppose to take two twice a day. If you have trouble with swallowing pills, these aren’t for you. You can taste the flavor as soon you put them in your mouth. I think they’re good pills otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Digestion!
customer_reviews.text: Before I started taking these vitamins, I used to be extremely sensitive to acidic and spicy foods. I couldn't even drink a cup of coffee without getting a HORRIBLE stomach ache afterwards. However, ever since I started taking Vitamin Code my stomach has not hurt ONCE. Additionally, it definitely helps with going number 2 (if that is a problem for you), so for me that is a plus. I would totally recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Can tell the difference!
customer_reviews.text: These are the first multivitamins I’ve ever used that actually make me feel better. I feel more energetic throughout the day and have a clearer mind. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Taste and smell is horrendous
customer_reviews.text: Oh my God.. horrendous. Truly. They taste and smell SO SO SO awful. Like dog food. Once you open the bottle you will gag. That’s how bad they smell and taste. Take my advice, seriously. I wasted my money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful after reading these reviews that these would work great. However, instead they caused severe abdominal cramping and diarrhea, which started after taking the pills and stopped after I stopped taking the pills. Made me extremely nauseous and completely took away my appetite. took pills as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: The vitamins are easy to swallow and they don't leave you with bright yellow urine. They also don't give you the gross vitamin burps. I am only taking 2 per day because I forget about taking them later in the day. I feel like my skin on my face has also improved and is brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it since its all natural
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because its derived from all natural ingredients. Pills are on the larger side and slightly harder to swallow but overall good quality stuff.
customer_reviews.author: A1122

customer_reviews.title: 2 tablets twice a day makes no sense
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize this was a 4 tablets a day vitamin so that was my fault but why would anyone opt for that? I can barely remember to take a vitamin once a day let alone twice. I noticed I was feeling sluggish so I’ve changed to a vitamin to help with that but honestly I wasn’t consistent with the 4 tablets, I’d most times remember to take 2 once a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients, but I don't like the taste
customer_reviews.text: I honestly hate the taste of these, and they are big so harder to swallow, so everytime I take it, I have to taste it.. and the flavor stays in my mouth.. but i bought them after researching good women's vitamins and the ingredients are good. I just wish they didn't have such a funky taste.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley heartfield

customer_reviews.title: Horrible stomach ache
customer_reviews.text: These gave me a crippling stomach ache for half the day every time I take them and that’s when I only take 2 at lunch with food. I can’t imagine if I took all 4 like you’re suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: I did soooo much research trying to find the best vitamins for women that has everything I need. This is it!! I’ve been on them for 4 days and I already feel incredible!! Iron+b12 makes for a happy lady!! While it doesn’t taste the greatest it goes away as long as you swallow fast. 😉 Buy it. For real.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to swallow. No bad reactions to tell and I do seem to have more energy after taking it. Only been taking it less than a month so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I've taken these vitamins for about six months now and they are my favorite by far that I have tried previously. With supplements, it's more of a what makes you personally feel the best day to day and these give me more energy and help keep me focused throughout my day. The ingredients are excellent and while they can be pricey, I usually order them on Amazon as they tend to be slightly cheaper than getting them at Whole Foods or Earth Fare.
customer_reviews.author: Christine G.

customer_reviews.title: Itching
customer_reviews.text: I took only two capsules but right after that all of my Skin was very itchy even though I’m not allergic to any food. Even after I stopped taking them the itchiness has not completely gone yet. That is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: 4 a day? Really?
customer_reviews.text: Without having done enough research, I was surprised to find that this multivitamin recommended 4 / day (2 in morning, 2 at night). I was surprised by this, as many other multi-vitamins are one pill. Clearly I'll do more research in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Shelleye02

customer_reviews.title: I like these
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I take them daily and notice a difference. I tried the MegaFood daily multivitamin, but after going through 1-2 bottles, I didn’t notice an improvement in how my body felt. I switched to these Garden of Life multivitamins a few months ago and have been taking them regularly since then.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Did a fair amount of research prior to buying this and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this vitamin for about three months and can tell a difference in my energy level. Did a fair amount of research prior to buying this and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Biellier

customer_reviews.title: I approve.
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these for a few weeks now. I really do like them. The capsules are a little big and you do have to take 4 per day, but eventually it becomes part of your daily routine. After two weeks I did notice that I did feel much more energetic thoroughout the day. I recommend these especially because of the probiotics, really great for your digestive health.
customer_reviews.author: OFarooqui

customer_reviews.title: No filler or preservatives!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a supplement which I am very happy with because I am not getting any fillers or preservatives that my system has to process. The fact it comes in a dark glass bottle tells me that care was taken to maintain the product.
customer_reviews.author: Anne s.

customer_reviews.title: More Energy & Better Sleep
customer_reviews.text: I am almost done with my first bottle. I took regularly for about three weeks (two a day, I’m small so I felt two was sufficient). I noticed a big difference in my energy levels and ability to sleep at night. My schedule got a little messed up and I got out of the routine of taking them and I was back to feeling tired and not sleeping well at night! So I feel they do something. Currently talking my husband into taking the men’s multi.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Women Multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended by my personal trainer. I have been taking this multivitamins for 2 years and the more I'm getting older the more it makes a good complement for my health and wellness. It gives me a good energy since I live in MI where 6 months is winter and I can't enough vitamin D here from the sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: P.Chung

customer_reviews.title: Highest rated in LsbDoor
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product because it had the highest rating according to LabDoor. Check it out. Excellent product. I also take their RAW Iron, which is also the highest rated.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Maria Cascio

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Take
customer_reviews.text: I've take other Vitamin Code vitamins before - specifically the B Complex - and been very happy. Although this pill is the same size, I find it more difficult to take. It always feels like it gets stuck in my throat, and the flavor always comes back up. It's impossible for me to take four a day for the full serving. I'm lucky if I can take two, and can't wait until I've finished the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael K

customer_reviews.title: Best vitamins period.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. High quality vitamins and quick absorption. I love that you can open the caplets and mix them in a protein shake without it tasting like medicine like other vitamins. Been taking them for years and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B.

customer_reviews.title: Side Effects
customer_reviews.text: The vitamins caused stomach upset after taking them for 1 week. I stopped taking them and the symptoms subsided.
customer_reviews.author: Sonjanetta Houston

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually really disappointed in these vitamins. I did not notice an increase in energy or any other positives. However, I was stressed out a lot when I took these. But I did not notice a difference in anything.
customer_reviews.author: Vidhu Bhatnagar

product_meta.title: Garden of Life Multivitamin for Women, Vitamin Code Women's Multi - 120 Capsules, Whole Food Womens Multi, Vitamins, Iron, Folate not Folic Acid & Probiotics for Womens Energy, Vegetarian Supplements
product_meta.description: Size:120 Count (Pack of 1)In developing Vitamin Code Women’s Formula, Garden of Life paid special attention to the complex functions of a woman’s body. Providing select nutrients to support breast health with added vitamins D and E, the reproductive system with folate, calcium, magnesium and zinc, bone strength with appropriate amounts of vitamins A, C, D3, calcium, magnesium and zinc, Vitamin Code Women’s Formula is the ultimate formulation for women. Suggested use: Adults take 4 capsules daily. Best when taken 2 capsules twice a day. May be taken with or without food. Capsules may be opened and contents may be added to water or raw juice. Not intended for children.
feature_bullets: MULTIVITAMIN WITH PROBIOTICS: Vitamin Code Women's multivitamin includes live probiotics and enzymes plus antioxidants for extraordinary health and vitality
WOMEN-SPECIFIC: This women's vitamin includes folate, calcium, magnesium, zinc and Vitamin A, C, D3, E and B-Complex for women's nutritional needs
VITAMIN CODE WOMEN: Comprehensive vitamin for breast health, reproductive health, bone strength, skin health, heart health, and digestive support
RAW MULTIVITAMIN: Vegetarian, gluten free, and dairy free whole food multivitamin, with NO binders or fillers
Healthy digestion with live probiotics and enzymes
MULTIVITAMIN SUPPLEMENT: Specially formulated multivitamin for women with breast support made from nutritious and RAW whole foods

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
